<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81664</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81664</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Communication</string>
            <string language="es">Comunicación</string>
            <string language="ga">Cumarsáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma comunicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comunicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επικοινωνία</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In the Conversation class there are three parts, precommunication, communication and postcommunication. These are the basis of the class and all that has to be done in the three of these.</string>
            <string language="es">En la clase de conversación hay tres partes, el momento previo comunicación, la comunicación y el momento posterior a la comunicación. Estas son la base de la clase y todo tiene que hacerse contando con estas tres fases.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sa rang Comhrá, bíonn trí chuid ann réamhchumarsáid, cumarsáid agus iarchumarsáid. Is iad seo creatlach an ranga agus níl le déanamh ach an trí chinn seo a chomhlíonadh chomh maith agus is féidir leat</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Advice Sheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Gespräch Kategorie gibt es drei Teile, 
precommunication, Kommunikation und postcommunication. Diese 
sind die Grundlage der Kategorie und alle, die in den drei von diesen 
getan werden muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la classe de conversation il y a trois 
parts, precommunication, transmissions et postcommunication. Ce 
sont la base de la classe et toutes ce qui doivent être faites dans 
les trois de ces derniers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na classe da conversação há três porções, 
precommunication, comunicações e postcommunication. Estes são
a base da classe e tudo que tem que ser feito nos três destes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel codice categoria di conversazione ci è tre 
parti, precommunication, comunicazione e postcommunication. 
Queste sono la base del codice categoria e tutta che debba 
essere fatta nei tre di questi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην κλάση συνομιλίας υπάρχουν τρία μέρη, 
precommunication, επικοινωνία και postcommunication. 
Αυτοί είναι η βάση της κλάσης και όλα αυτά πρέπει να 
γίνουν στους τρεις από αυτούς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parlare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
